item.title: Preventing ReDoS Attacks with Regolith
item.description: JakeRoggenbuck/regolith A server-side TypeScript and JavaScript library immune to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) attacks by using Rust and linear RegEx under the hood.
